item.description:
Anyone up for an other outdoor event...biking in Cope Cod Canal ?

Date: 8/18/07
Time: 11:00 AM
Place: Cape Cod Canal
meet at Sagamore Recreation Area parking lot.

Bring your own lunch bags and drinks.
Bring sunblock lotion or a cap at least

If it rains, postpone to 8/25/07

This is for people know how to bike only. However, it is also a great place to roller blading and jogging/walking.

here are a few links you can check:

1) http://www.great-trai...
2) http://www.nae.usace....
3) http://www.capecodout...
4) see the photos of the canal from Sagamore Bridge
http://www.freefoto.c...
5) http://www.nae.usace....
6) bike rental site
http://www.insidecape...

Please try to call them ahead if you like.

If you like to swim, you can bring your towels too.

Direction:

From Route 3 (merge to R6), take Canal road off of the rotary, just before the
Sagamore Bridge, for a 1/4 mile to the Sagamore Recreation Area parking
lot.

*Transportation is your responsibility but if you need a ride, we will try to arrange for you and if anyone can give a ride to someone, please let me know or post your message in your RSVP.

email to susieq_tan@yahoo.com

Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Biking at Cape Cod Canal
